longBusinessSummary: Clearford Water Systems Inc., a water management company, provides unified water infrastructure solutions in Canada, the United States, India, and internationally. It operates in three segments: Waterworks, Water & Wastewater Infrastructure Delivery, and UV Pure Disinfection. The company's Waterworks segment provides water and wastewater management services to developers, golf courses, land lease park owners, seasonal parks, such as campgrounds, landfill and biosolids management, and smaller municipal plants; and offers engineering, project management, and bypass and disinfection work. It's Water & Wastewater Infrastructure Delivery segment engages in the design, build, and construction of water and wastewater infrastructure; and offer Clearford One solution, a packaged decentralized communal sewage system. UV Pure Disinfection segment, which engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of UV disinfection equipment. The company was formerly known as Clearford Industries Inc. and changed its name to Clearford Water Systems Inc. in June 2014. Clearford Water Systems Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in Ottawa, Canada.
